import {useState} from 'react' const Add = (props) => { const [movie, setMovie] = useState({title: '', runtime: '', review: '', img: '', link: ''}) const handleChange = (event) => { setMovie({...movie, [event.movie.name]: event.movie.value} ) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() props.handleCreate(movie) } return (




) } export default Add
